title: 2 Bed next to Maria Hernandez! H/HW included
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


BUSHWICK ASAP MOVE IN

Spacious 2 bedroom apartment steps away from the Jefferson L stop – 15 minute commute to Manhattan!!!*

- Close Distance to Maria Hernandez Park!!
- Bedrooms on opposite sides of the apartment – privacy!
- One is King/Queen sized and the other is Full-sized
- Open kitchen/living room
- Both bedrooms flooded with natural sunlight
- Closets in each room
- Modern bathroom

You’ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues.

Please feel free to reach out to schedule a showing today!!
